Top Notch Services.

Our quality standards apply also in terms of service, technical expertise and advice.
Our dedicated employees are happy to assist you with know-how and experience in your daily business.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Web Development

We have created an awesome theme that will help designers, developers and companies create websites for their startups quickly and easily.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

App Development

We are professionals in native and cross-platform mobile apps fit for all business sectors as the finest mobile app development company.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Search Engine Optimization

Our SEO strategies will earn your website a higher ranking in search results. That will increase online sales for your web-based operations.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Social Media Marketing

As a marketing professional with a decade of experience, we know how to grow your social media in terms and reached to the potential audiences.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

2d/3d Animation

When it comes to 2d/3d animation, we have specialized, experienced, creative and award winning inhouse team.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Visual Effects VFX

We work on the spectacular scenes and tiny details that make movies truly mind-blowing.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Motion Graphics

Accomplish your dreams and fetch ideas from mind to the big screens.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Video Editing

We are a professional video editing company, doing all kinds of video editing with your raw footage.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Illustration

We are highly skilled in creating illustrations, such as distinctive, vibrant illustrations and animations that consumers will remember.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section bklyn_section_anchor_id=”Team” el_name=”Mobile APP”][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-12″]

Our High-End Mobile APP Development Services

We offer a full cycle of application design, integration and management services. Whether it is a consumer oriented app or a transformative enterprise-class solution, the company leads the entire mobile app development process from ideation and concept to delivery, and to ongoing ongoing support.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1654823883520{padding-top: 200px !important;padding-bottom: 200px !important;background-image: url(https://www.techlabsteam.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/29-.gif?id=2142) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: contain !important;}” effect=”slideInLeft”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]

Client-Focused, Value-Driven, Custom App Development

We have developed hundreds of apps for companies ranging from the world’s leading brands to fast-moving start-ups. We have particular expertise in Swift, Objective-C, Flutter, React Native, Kotlin, Java, and C++.

– Custom iOS and Android apps development
– Native and cross-platform solutions
– Second platform app development
– UI/UX design
– Consulting and prototyping
– Automated QA and testing
– Power management, notification and geofencing
– Embedded Android & AOSP customizations
– Maintenance and post-warranty support

View Portfolio

[/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1654913565928{margin-top: -100px !important;}”][vc_column]

What Our Client Says

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][wcp_testimonials_outer arrows=”true” autoplay=”true” slidestoshow=”1″ slidestoscroll=”1″][wcp_testimonials_inner style=”4″ image_id=”2180″ title=”Krissy Lee”]I have been working with the tech lab team for the past six months. They created a phenomenal website that has helped generate consistent e-commerce sales. The website is extremely customer friendly and easy to navigate. The customer service and professionalism Makes this team truly the best![/wcp_testimonials_inner][wcp_testimonials_inner style=”4″ image_id=”2182″ title=”Cheryl Verzi Buckley”]Huge thank you to Mark and his team for creating a website for my new art business! I had no clue as where to begin! My friends, family, and clients have given me positive feed back on my site. Again, many thanks!
Cheryl, from Simply COLOR[/wcp_testimonials_inner][wcp_testimonials_inner style=”4″ image_id=”2183″ title=”Laurent Elie Badessi”]Thank you very much Tech Lab Team for the help on up-dating my html website. The result was great and the overall experience was smooth with a quick turn around. You guys are great – High 5 !!![/wcp_testimonials_inner][wcp_testimonials_inner style=”4″ image_id=”2181″ title=”Melissa Buwembo”]I’ve been working with Tech Labs Team for the past several months after an UpWork blog designer ghosted on me. They have been more like a partner than just an executor and it’s been great to have that as I have specific design and aesthetic ideas for my upcoming blog A Golden State (agoldenstate.co). I look forward to continuing to work with them as I optimize and grow my site![/wcp_testimonials_inner][wcp_testimonials_inner style=”4″ image_id=”2179″ title=”James Patrick”]Hired TLS to rebuild my website. They went above and beyond to ensure that my experience and final product was PERFECT. Entire team was kind, patient, and supportive from start to finish. Definitely recommend![/wcp_testimonials_inner][/wcp_testimonials_outer][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

Testimonials

[/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section]
